query:
-- Insert sample interview
INSERT INTO interviews (id, candidate_id, job_id, scheduled_date, status, overall_score, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES 
(1, 1, 1, '2025-12-15 10:00:00', 'completed', 78, NOW(), NOW());

-- Insert interview questions
INSERT INTO interview_questions (id, interview_id, question_text, question_type, expected_duration, question_order, created_at)
VALUES
(1, 1, 'Tell me about yourself and your professional background', 'behavioral', 120, 1, NOW()),
(2, 1, 'Describe a challenging project you worked on and how you overcame obstacles', 'behavioral', 180, 2, NOW()),
(3, 1, 'Write a function to reverse a linked list in Python', 'coding', 300, 3, NOW()),
(4, 1, 'How do you handle conflicts in a team environment?', 'behavioral', 120, 4, NOW()),
(5, 1, 'What are your salary expectations and career goals?', 'general', 90, 5, NOW());

-- Insert interview responses with AI scores
INSERT INTO interview_responses (id, interview_id, question_id, video_url, transcript, ai_score, ai_feedback, duration, created_at)
VALUES
(1, 1, 1, 'https://storage.example.com/videos/response1.mp4', 
 'Hi, I am John Doe, a software engineer with 5 years of experience in full-stack development. I have worked extensively with React, Node.js, and Python...', 
 85, 'Strong introduction with clear communication. Good overview of technical skills and experience. Could improve by adding specific achievements.', 
 115, NOW()),
(2, 1, 2, 'https://storage.example.com/videos/response2.mp4',
 'In my previous role, we faced a critical bug in production that affected thousands of users. I took the lead in debugging, coordinated with the team, and implemented a fix within 4 hours...',
 82, 'Excellent problem-solving demonstration. Shows leadership and technical competence. Good use of specific examples and metrics.', 
 175, NOW()),
(3, 1, 3, 'https://storage.example.com/videos/response3.mp4',
 'def reverse_linked_list(head): prev = None; current = head; while current: next_node = current.next; current.next = prev; prev = current; current = next_node; return prev',
 70, 'Correct algorithm implementation. Code works but lacks comments and edge case handling. Could improve code readability and add test cases.', 
 280, NOW()),
(4, 1, 4, 'https://storage.example.com/videos/response4.mp4',
 'I believe in open communication and addressing conflicts directly. I schedule one-on-one meetings to understand different perspectives and find common ground...',
 75, 'Good conflict resolution approach. Shows maturity and communication skills. Could strengthen with a specific example of successful conflict resolution.', 
 110, NOW()),
(5, 1, 5, 'https://storage.example.com/videos/response5.mp4',
 'Based on my experience and market research, I am looking for a salary range of $120k-$140k. My career goal is to become a technical lead within 2-3 years...',
 78, 'Realistic expectations with good market awareness. Clear career goals aligned with the role. Professional and confident delivery.', 
 85, NOW());
